all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Lift up your voices and spare not. Call upon the nations to repent, both old and young, both bond and free, saying: Prepare yourselves for the great day of the Lord;
Doctrine and Covenants 43:20
Quote of the Day
"As you fulfill your birthright responsibilities, you are never alone. The Lord of the vineyard labors with you."
Bradley R. Wilcox | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
